## PropertyFilter type

field, operation, value \['foo', 'eq', 'bar'\] \['count', 'ge', 20\]

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type PropertyFilter<T extends Properties = Properties> = [
    T extends null ? string : keyof T | `%${string & keyof T}` | `%${string & keyof T}%` | `${string & keyof T}%`,
    Operation,
    any
];
```
